language.entry: %+d%% Food Consumed if has Crimson Curse
Increased Bloodlust state Duration for Crimson Curse
Decreased Craving state Duration for Crimson Curse
If Target is {colour_start|bleed}Bleeding{colour_end}: {colour_start|buff}Buff Self:{colour_end} +25%% DMG vs {colour_start|bleed}Bleeding{colour_end}
If Target is {colour_start|bleed}Bleeding{colour_end}: {colour_start|buff}Buff Self:{colour_end} +30%% DMG vs {colour_start|bleed}Bleeding{colour_end}
If Target is {colour_start|bleed}Bleeding{colour_end}: {colour_start|buff}Buff Self:{colour_end} +35%% DMG vs {colour_start|bleed}Bleeding{colour_end}
If Target is {colour_start|blight}Blighted{colour_end}: {colour_start|buff}Buff Self:{colour_end} +25%% DMG vs {colour_start|blight}Blighted{colour_end}
If Target is {colour_start|blight}Blighted{colour_end}: {colour_start|buff}Buff Self:{colour_end} +30%% DMG vs {colour_start|blight}Blighted{colour_end}
If Target is {colour_start|blight}Blighted{colour_end}: {colour_start|buff}Buff Self:{colour_end} +35%% DMG vs {colour_start|blight}Blighted{colour_end}
{colour_start|debuff}0 ACC vs enemies above 25%% MAX HP{colour_end}
Self: {colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 2 HP + 2 bonus HP for each Corpse
Self: {colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 3 HP + 3 bonus HP for each Corpse
Self: {colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 4 HP + 4 bonus HP for each Corpse
{colour_start|debuff}Debuff Self:{colour_end} -3 SPD / -30%% Stress Heal received {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(1 battle){colour_end}

Much like the rest of its porcine kin, the Gourmet harbors a brutal ferocity with a combination of debilitating strikes and devastating blows. The culinary skills it has developed can be witnessed in combat, peppering foes with attacks in preparation for a final savory onslaught of violence. Ensuring the customer is satisfied is critical for any chef, and the Gourmet is proficient at supporting allies so they may partake in the feast as well.

Wielding massive cooking implements, the Gourmet is always ready to prepare a new meal from the remains of anything unfortunate enough to be considered fresh ingredients. While an apron does not provide much defense from attack, the swine's massive bulk ensures it will outlast any and all dining confrontation.

The swine's frightening visage may be oppressive and its methods unnerving at best, but there is no denying the exquisite results of its gastronomical skills. With only a makeshift kitchen, the Gourmet can prepare a hearty feast that can bolster the endurance of all willing to partake. Just don't ask what is in it...
"Want food. GOOD food. Want MORE. Make. MORE!!!"
Say pal, you don't look so good.
A hearty meal with a bit of everything! The sheer amount will leave one sluggish after consuming.
Have a taste of the wicked power over life your foes wield, however brittle it may leave you feeling.
A simple meal lacking robust ingredients, but the quality of what has been utilized fills one with a hardy sensation.
The sharp and savory flavor inspires enjoyers into doubling their efforts to procure more!
The bewitching tastes of the deep give adventurers an appreciation for the quiet and safety it provides.
An enriching meal from the finest cut of swine. It will leave you craving more!
For those with an adventurous palate, the swine's appendages make for an exhilarating treat.
This humble treat will attune your senses to the wild granting you an excessive level of focus.
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!
A bloostuffed meal popular among the Crimson Elite, this has an empowering flavor for those afflicted by the Curse.
This cocktail entices all enjoyers into a frenzy at the sight of blood and further enhances the potency of those already Cursed.

This {colour_start|gourmet_com}!spUri0uS{colour_end} shard filled dessert will {colour_start|gourmet_com}REfr3sH Sk|l1 u$e?{colour_end} and leave you with a soothing {colour_start|gourmet_com}<H0rRor>{colour_end} bliss.

The {colour_start|gourmet_com}e t e r n a l{colour_end} morning begins {colour_start|gourmet_com}an& en&s{colour_end} with an invigorating meal that guarantees {colour_start|gourmet_com}^fEeBle*{colour_end} critical success for{colour_start|debuff}EVER{colour_end} the day!
Culinarily appreciating these beasts grants one a better understanding on how to face them in combat.
The rich tofu procured from the locals refreshes the spirit but sits uneasily in the stomach. Enjoy with talismans on hand.
Fine. Just don't tell me what's in it.
Oh hells that... was not so bad actually.
Well it does look better than I expected.
Wait, YOU made this? It's surprisingly good!
Mmmm.. what's this crunchy pa- Wait. No. Don't answer that...
At this point, I will eat just about anything.
You no want? Hmmph. More for me.
Taste this. It good. No has human meat... This time.
Save bandage. Will use in stew. Add flavor.
Hunt. Cook. Eat. Sleep. Repeat. Is good.
We live. They die. We eat. All good.
Much food. Eat fill. Need all be strong!
Hrrmmm... Need salt? What you think?
If you die, me make you in good meal. No worry.
Hmph. Too many cooks in kitchen.
Mmmm... smell good... GUH?! THAT ME?!
No! Is my blood! Stop blood!
Hmm? This my blood? Or food stain?
No bleed in food! Will ruin!
Bleh. Light taste bad for eyes.
Me no like bright. Food no like bright too.
No need see. Me smell them.
No light. Smell that? Food near.
No fear. Dark good. Smell good.
Good. No light. Lure out big food.
Wait! Might be poison! No trust!
This good? This bad? This trap?!
Grrrr... MOVE, RUNT. Me do it!
Me eat this! And that! And this!
All nooks. All crannies. Need check.
Me is chef! More great than swine! Most great ever!
Need clean tools. Need more shine.
(nods) Good killing tool. Make good food from meat.
Me is chef! More great than swine! Most great ever!
Me claw self from filth! Me be good chef!
(sniffs) This smell... is good smell... Me taste it!
Hmmph. Spirits not happy. Me fix.
ME EAT. AND EAT. AND EAT. STILL HUNGER. EAT UNTIL GONE!
Grrrr me no like you! And you! And you!
Me more strong than food! Me hunt then cook food!
We hunt! We cook! WE EAT!
Grrrrr... me want go town. This place dumb!
No more fire. Cold food only now.
No more fire wood? Hmmph. Me want s'mores...
Guh?! What mean no food left?!
Me bring many food! ... Fine. Can share.
Make big fire! Me want s'mores!
Me use more fire for next meal.
Me no like you least. Is praise.
Me clean knife. Me take watch.
You sleep. Need strong for hunt.
Bleh. Taste bland. Move. Me make instead.
(marches directly into the kitchen and starts preparing meals)
(is challenged by the tavern's chef to yet another cooking contest)
Me know game. But for swine, loser die. Is fun.
Grrr... no touch. You eat this. Tell what think.
Hmmm... what make this food more good?
Bath? Me is clean! Stains for taste!
Me stay in kitchen where is safe.
Me no go. Have pie in oven.
Me no have time for puny job.
Me want BIG job. No runt job.
Feh - me too good for this.
GRRAAA! STUPID SWINE! WHY YOU HERE?!
Grraaa!!! (spits) Mill man make mouth taste ash!
You make ash! Me make food!
Mill man weak! Make him food for crop!
No more light! No fire! Taste bad!
Me need you eyes! See color more!
NO WANT EYES! THEY TASTE TOO MUCH SOUND!
Light is in me! Get it out!
Wait. Is me chef or is me food?
Too much thought! Me have too much!
You smell dead. But sound health?
Why you let them see you? Hide you heart.
You miss! You hit! You miss! You hit!
The light you have smell rotten.
Belly full with eyes and color...
Mind full with sound and fire...
All is one color. Color is all sound.
Me smell a smelly smell that smell smelly.
Eyes lie. Nose also lie. Only color is truth.
Hmmm... Not enough color. Need more youth.
Food is lie. Lie is food. Is lie food. Lie food is...
Me no eat until me find mouth.
Me smell only ash on you. Hear only death.
Eat your soul. Consume the heat of light.
Me is only pain. No heal.
Me only trust the shadow of light.
You color taint the pretty light.
ALL MUST BLEED! IT IS WAY!
Me give food. You give blood!
ALL WILL BLEED! ME WILL FEAST!
ONLY BLOOD! ALL ELSE IS FILTH!
BLOOD IS ONLY FOOD ME NEED!
Blood is best taste. Me no eat filth!
Me have cook standards. Only best. Blood is best!
ME WILL HAVE BLOOD! ALL BLOOD!
ME HAVE MUCH HEALTH! BLOOD IS PURE!
ME WILL TASTE YOU AND NO WILL STOP ME!
No waste blood! Me will drink!
Save you blood. Will use in stew.
So hungry... me not notice notice...
BLOOD IS ALL! SMELL BLOOD ALL AROUND!
ME EAT ALL! ME DRINK ALL BLOOD!
Me will find blood! Only thing that matter!
Hmmm. Drink make blood taste good? Find out. Need more drink.
Boring. Me know more good game.
Me strong enough. Will show and win!
Want bring food to nice person.
Where smell good friend? No want losers.
This dumb. Where person with good smell? Me smell them.
No want touchy soft person. Want cook alone.
They no let me sleep there.
Friend in church no like this game.
Me want church friend. Not soft person.
Where church friend? Me smell them.
Me drink blood! It more good!
Me challenge body! No want losers!
Soft person no make strong. PAIN MAKE STRONG.
Light weak! Me strong! Pain make more strong!
Me no cheat! Is rule for swine!
Me confuse. Me was told to taste. Why wrong?
Me have food idea. Must make now!
Even swine no do what me see there...
Me no like Light. It confuse. No can eat.
What? It want me hurt? Grrrr...
Yes. Me am swine. Now move. Want make food.
No worry. Me no eat you. Too scrawny.
Me make food. You thank. Is good.
Need more ingredients. Me go get.
Is time to hunt. Then cook. Then eat.
Me pack lunch. We go now.
Hmm? Missing person? Me know? ...... no.
NO NO NO NO NO NO NO!!!
(found shivering silently in corner of tavern)
Me see you look! Want me food! You no get!
This food MINE! NOT FOR YOU!
Me big! You small! Me get MORE!
This food MINE! NOT FOR YOU!
You runt. All you runts. Hate runts.
You weak. Scrawny. No worth meal.
Swine taste good. Me swine?... hmmmm...
Me know now! Me no pig! Me pretty pony!
This game dumb. We test strength!
That no how eat food! You n- oh.
Doctor dumb! Me strong! Me no listen!
Doctor food bad. Me no eat!
That smell! That place! IT BURNS!!!
Warrens no safe... Hamlet no safe... Nowhere safe.
Cook for fish lady! You be meal!
NO EAT FISH. FISH EAT YOU!
No! Me no food! Me eat food!
Me no join! No like swim!
Me no join! No like swim!
Me no join! No like swim!
Me no join! No like swim!
Me no join! No like swim!
Weak king! You protect runt? Bah!
Me kill king! Me kill runt! Make meal from both!
Me hate runt! Feed to rats!
Me no like look of eyes man...
Me get hungry! Me will starve!
Me no like eyes! Scary eyes!
Me so hungry. Me not survive...
Gah! Me think me leave stove on at town!
Me big! You small! More hard to hit!
Me no like them smell! Me move away!
NO NO NO NO NO NO NO!!!
Me no like plan! Is scary!
No no no! Me not food!
Too scary! Me close eyes! Did me hit?!
Food too strong! We need run!
They hunt weak first! Is me next?!
No stop! Keep scary food away!
Me safe here! Me no move!
They much strong. They hunt. We food...
Me know you hate swine! No trust me!
Why you no want food? WHY?!
Hmm? What you do to food?!
Rats no get food! Hate rats!
Me trust smell more. You smell like RAT.
Me watch food. Make sure you no touch.
Sneaky rats. Me no trust with back.
No! Me have more good idea!
Me no like that. Me do this.
Sneaky rats get put in soup!
You rats no run and hide. You stay and FIGHT!
You try leave me? Me more smart than that!
They want eat me! No let them!
Me no fear rats! Only sneaky! No strong!
Me no like them! Smell like sneaky rats!
You let them attack me! Me know!
They know kill weakest! Then kill next more easy!
You stay where me see you!
Me trust only food me cook!
What you plan? Smell rat scheme.
You think me weak? Me show you strong!
Me no need help from rats.
You miss on purpose! Me see!
Me trust only me and food. No trust sneaky rats.
Me sleep in dark spot. Away from you rats.
Me no trust poison from rats.
GRRRAAAA! WHAT YOU DO TO FOOD?!
(sniffs food suspiciously then dumps it in fire)
Flavor too strong for weak runts!
Me kill weak runts! All weak runts!
Me more hungry! Me eat all!
You not worth food! Feed to rats!
You all weak runts! Me hate runts!
No food for weak runts! Runts die and cooked!
No! That not how done! This how!
You dumb! Me do what me want!
You kill food or you be food.
Kill or die. Me cook either way.
Hmmph. Weak runts not worth food me cook.
Runts will die. Me no help.
Me no need help from runt.
Hunger make food taste more good.
Me big! Me strong! Food no can hurt!
Pain make anger! Anger make strong!
You small! Me big! Pain no hurt me!
Hit me! Me hit more hard!
You no can hurt me! You weak!
Me no weak! Me no run!
Me blood taste sweet! Want more!
You in way. Me take hit.
Me stay here. Can eat all hurt!
No! Pain make strong! Me most strong!
Me want pain spice. Heal is bland.
You no cook! Me cook! Me know best!
Me make food more spicy! Much more spicy!
Blood make good broth. Me have much blood.
You have bland smell. No want.
Me most big! Me get most food!
You no deserve tasty food! You eat filth!
Me take all shiny. Give food for shiny.
Only best food for best cook.
Me more good than swine. Me more good that you too.
Weak be made food. Me be cook food.
Me eat all! Meat eat until no food!
Me guard food. Is more good than you.
Me best chef! Me show you!
Me no listen. Me more strong!
No! That one mine! Is best smell!
Me cook, me eat. You no cook, you starve.
Me get meal. You... get scraps.
Runts waste food. No get any.
Me chef? Me swine? What... me?
They hate. You hate. Me hate. Me...
Me no care. Live? Die? Dull.
Let me sleep... me much want sleep...
Me no cook... food no good...
Me no good... me no deserve...
All beast! No man! No swine! All Beast!
What that sandvich? Kill them all? GOOD IDEA!
Me eat optimist once. Me not keep them down.
Me eat clown once. Taste funny.
Oink oink. Oink oink oink? Oink oink oink oink oink oink oink oink! Oink.
Me hide near angry food. Is smart.
Hmmm. Food taste more good over here.
Ha! That slaps me on knee!
Why waste time on tiny scraps?
Me am go to kill you. And kill you. And kill you!
It good day to be giant pig man.
Me laugh at tiny runts! Ha!
Me have plan for you. MORE PAIN.
No, you cut like this. Watch.
That close. You almost get lost!
Me promise you pain without end!
Killing you is full time job now.
You are dead. No big surprise.
The burning you feel? It is SHAME.
No play with food! Bad manner!
(bites item and spits back out) Bleh. No pickle...
Bleh. Smell like burn. No want.
You no clean hand! No touch!
Me know what me do. You no help.
Onion? Check. Eggs? Check. Dirt? Check...
Me starve! No eat in minutes!
Hmm? Make you sandwich? Ok. Wait here. Need you size bread.
Me no like green eggs and ham.
So what me pig? Me still best chef.
Me have plan for new meal.
Me have plan for new meal.
They no scary. Me more scary.
We strong. We live. They weak. They die.
We fight! We win! We feast!
They not tough when me cook them.
We kill. They die. Me cook. We eat.
Me have new recipe. Me show you.
You fight! You get big meal!
Fight make big hunger! We feast big!
Me eat much good. That make me strong!
